name: Nature’s Helping Hand: Oatmeal Honey / unscented 4.5oz
description:
Handmade hot processed oatmeal, honey, olive, coconut and palm oil.

Our soap is handmade from all natural ingredients
All natural saponified oils and or butters, essential oils, may contain herbs and natural exfoliate, no artificial colors, fragrances or preservatives.
We have a small line right now, but if there is something you would like to see email me a request djsmith1006@centurylink.net

Nature’s Helping Hand
